mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS reviewCount FROM REVIEW WHERE rvDeleted != 'yes' AND eating_id = #{eating_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTCNT FROM (SELECT rv.rvId, rv.eating_id, rv.user_id, rv.rvComment, rv.rvScore, rv.rvWrittenDate, rv.rvModifyDate, u.uNickname, rv.rvDeleted FROM REVIEW rv, USERS u WHERE rv.user_id = u.user_id AND rv.rvDeleted != 'yes' AND rv.eating_id = #{eating_id} ORDER BY rv.rvmodifydate DESC) A) WHERE RNUM >= #{rvCriteria.startNum} AND RNUM <= #{rvCriteria.endNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(rvId, rvComment, rvScore, rvWrittenDate, rvModifyDate, eating_id, user_id, rvDeleted) VALUES(REVIEW_SEQ.nextval, #{reviewVO.rvComment}, #{reviewVO.rvScore}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{reviewVO.eating_id}, #{reviewVO.user_id}, 'no')
mapper.delete: UPDATE REVIEW SET rvDeleted = 'yes', rvScore = 0 WHERE rvId = #{rvId}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET rvComment = #{reviewVO.rvComment}, rvScore = #{reviewVO.rvScore}, rvModifyDate = SYSDATE WHERE rvId = #{reviewVO.rvId}
